mapper.sql: AiId, Aid, ImageUrl, IsMain, Created, Updated
mapper.update: update m_appointment_images set Aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ImageUrl = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsMain = #{isMain,jdbcType=BIT}, Created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where AiId = #{aiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select AiId, Aid, ImageUrl, IsMain, Created, Updated from m_appointment_images
